ygData.subject: Re: Where to hunt at 20
ygData.msgSnippet: When talking about OverThere... beware of Goons, aka Dragoons. They re roughly level 50 roaming mobs in OT and many a party has been disbanded for
ygData.messageBody:
When talking about OverThere... beware of Goons,
aka Dragoons.<br><br>They're roughly level 50 roaming
mobs in OT and many a party has been disbanded for
having them wander through and kill them one too many
times.<br><br>The Goon's are faster than wolf form and I believe
even or maybe faster than Greater Wolf form. With a
bard with an instrument-- might help you outrun one.
Might.<br><br>So if you have a druid or ranger in your group when
you're in OT-- make sure they know to check Track every
so often. Otherwise... OT is an awesome place for
around 30. Before that LOIO is also awesome. Course
killing in Kunark all the time might get tiring. You
might want to try Velious at 30 instead of OT. Snow
Cougars should be good exp at 30 and you might get a good
earring. (cougar claw)<br><br>Grin.<br>shooman out
